name: Nobody is perfect (Nikl)
description:
Submission for Mini Jam 77

There was a big Pandemic in the rectangles land. After a lot of social distancing, it feels like your friends changed a lot. You have the feeling they became circles! Now that you got vaccinated, get the courage to meet them again and see that they indeed still have corners ^^

Controls: WASD / Arrow keys + mouse pointer to turn

How to play:

  • Get close to grey and filled shapes by covering their centre with the area in front of you
  • When befriending other shapes they will turn green and give you some Courage to continue (top left bar)
  • When your courage bar is full you will level up and there will be more shapes you can befriend
  • Keep distance from the spirals => they denied the vaccination
  • If you cover the centre of a circle or a spiral, you will lose courage
  • You lose the game if your courage reaches 0
  • You win when you reach courage level 7
